actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to allow the investment tax credit with respect to certain leased commuter cars.

summary.text: Allows, under the Internal Revenue Code, the investment tax credit with respect to leased depreciable property acquired by a governmental unit pursuant to the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 in an amount equal to that paid by the lessee in rent and other contributions to the cost of such property.

titles.title: A bill to allow the investment tax credit with respect to certain leased commuter cars.
